analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
āsava sāsava duka ādi sa ni dassa na ttika

original: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ ca iva no ca āsavaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva
analyzed: na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ ca iva

original: no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: no ca āsavaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Naāsavañceva naanāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi purimanayena tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na āsavam ca iva na anāsavam na anidassana sappaṭigha mūle pi purima nayena tīṇi yeva hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca
analyzed: na āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ ca iva no ca

original: āsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ,
analyzed: āsavaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka
āsava āsava sampayutta duke pañhā na labbhati
